isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO SERIES - ASSEMBLE - RANGE CYLINDER ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: RANGE CYLINDER ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Apply Eaton lubricant #71214 supplied with the O-ring kit to all shift cylinder assembly and insert valve O-rings so a film covers the entire surface of each O-ring.
Apply Eaton rust preventative #71213 or equivalent to all shift cylinder walls and yoke bars. Cover entire yoke bar surface that comes in contact with shift cylinder O-ring.

Apply Eaton lockwire #1619 or equivalent to the shift yoke bolts. The lockwire should anchor each bolt head securely to the yoke or to the second bolt which fastens to the yoke bar. The lockwire should be twisted together, trimmed, and bent out of the way of other parts.

step1.para: Install the interlock pin in the cylinder housing ( Figure 176).
Install the small O-ring in the cylinder housing bore ( Figure 178).

figure.caption: Figure 178. Small O-ring In Cylinder Housing Bore

step1.para: Install the piston O-rings on the piston I.D. and O.D. ( Figure 179).

figure.caption: Figure 179. Piston O-rings On Piston I.D. and O.D.

step1.para: Position a new gasket on the cylinder housing mounting surface ( Figure 180).

figure.caption: Figure 180. New Gasket On Cylinder Housing Surface

step1.para: Install the cylinder housing with the air passage away from the rear bearing cover ( Figure 180).
Place the range shift yoke, with the threaded yoke hub up and HI range synchronizer towards the front, in the sliding clutch slot.
Place the range shift yoke and synchronizer assembly on the output shaft, engaging the sliding clutch splines ( Figure 181).

figure.caption: Figure 181. Range Shift Yoke & Synchronizer Assembly

step1.para: Insert the yoke bar threaded-end into the range cylinder housing bore, through the range shift yoke hub Figure 182). Align the bar notches with range shift yoke retaining bolt holes.

figure.caption: Figure 182. Align Bar Notches With Bolt Holes

step1.para: Install the two (2) yoke bar retaining bolts ( Figure 183). Tighten to 50 to 65 ft-lbs. (68 to 88 N•m) of torque.
From the rear, insert the piston. Push it in as far as it will go ( Figure 184).
Secure the piston with the retaining nut ( Figure 185). Tighten to 70 to 85 ft-lbs. (95 to 115 N•m) of torque.
Install the insert valves in the cylinder cover bores, nipple end in the proper direction ( Figure 186).
Install the insert valve retaining nuts. Tighten the retaining nut to 40 to 50 ft-lbs. (54 to 68 N•m) of torque ( Figure 186).
Position a new gasket on the cylinder housing cover mounting surface ( Figure 187). The gasket air passage must align with the housing air passage.

figure.caption: Figure 187. Position New Gasket On Cylinder Housing Cover

step1.para: Position the range cylinder cover over the gasket ( Figure 188).

figure.caption: Figure 188. Range Cylinder Cover Over The Gasket

step1.para: Apply Eaton/Fuller sealant #71205 or Loctite 242 to the retaining bolts.
Install the bolts and tighten to 20 to 25 ft-lbs. (27 to 34 N•m) of torque.
